wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast#Tolkien Society tradition|Birthday Toast]].
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Saul Zaentz]] dies.
* '''[[30 January|30]]''' - Director [[Arthur Rankin, Jr.]] dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 245]]'' is published.
==February==
* '''[[27 February|27]]''' - ''[[The Fall of Arthur]]'' is published in paperback.
* '''[[27 February|27]]''' - ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]'' pocket edition is published.
==March==
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - ''[[Anglo-Saxon Community in J.R.R. Tolkien's the Lord of the Rings]]'' is published.
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 246]]'' is published.

==April==
* '''[[3 April|3]]''' - ''[[Smaug: Unleashing the Dragon]]'' is published.
* '''[[5 April|5]]''' - ''Words of Westernesse: Adûnaic and Westron'' is published.
* '''[[5 April|5]]''' - ''The Moon in The Hobbit'' is published.
* '''[[5 April|5]]''' - ''The indigenous peoples of Eriador and Gondor'' is published.
* '''[[7 April|7]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the UK.
* '''[[8 April|8]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the USA.
* '''[[19 April|19]] - [[21 April|21]]''' - [http://www.hobbitcon.de/ Hobbitcon 2].
* '''[[24 April|24]]''' - [[Peter Jackson]] announces that the third ''[[The Hobbit (film series)|Hobbit film]]'' will be renamed to ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies|The Battle of the Five Armies]]''.
* '''[[30 April|30]]''' - ''[[Hither Shore 10]]'' is published.

==May==
* '''[[22 May|22]]''' - '''''[[Beowulf: A Translation and Commentary]]'' by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], edited by [[Christopher Tolkien]], is published.'''
* '''[[24 May|24]]''' - [[Beowulf Launch Party]] hosted by [[The Tolkien Society]] and [[Middle-earth Network]] with support from [[Tolkien Brasil]] and [[Marcel Bülles|The Tolkienist]].
* '''[[28 May|28]]''' - ''[[Middle-Earth in Magic Mirror Maps]]'' is published.
* '''[[30 May|30]]''' - ''[[Tolkien in the New Century|Tolkien in the New Century: Essays in Honor of Tom Shippey]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''A Companion to J. R. R. Tolkien'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 247]]'' is published.

==June==
* '''[[6 June|6]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Chronicles: Cloaks & Daggers]]'' is published.
* '''[[15 June|15]]''' - Voice actor [[Casey Kasem]] dies.
* '''[[19 June|19]]''' - A new 60th Anniversary Edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' is published. 
* '''[[19 June|19]]''' - An updated edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion]]'' is published.
==July==
* '''[[18 July|18]] - [[20 July|20]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing]] 2014.
* '''[[26 July|26]]''' - [[Laocoon]], one of Tolkien's favourite trees, lost two limbs. Subsequently, the Oxford Botanic Garden decided that the tree must be felled for safety reasons.
* '''[[29 July|29]]''' - Producer and interviewer [[Denys Gueroult]] dies.

==August==
* '''[[8 August|8]] - [[11 August|11]]''' - [[Mythcon 45]] in Wheaton College, Norton.
* '''[[14 August|14]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]] Seminar as part of WorldCon, London.
* '''[[14 August|14]]''' - ''[[Tolkien On Fairy-stories]]'' is published in paperback.
* '''[[28 August|28]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2015]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 248]]'' is published.

==September==
* '''[[11 September|11]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Annual 2015]]'' is published.
* '''[[11 September|11]] - [[14 September|14]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2014]] at Lady Margaret Hall.
* '''[[12 September|12]]''' - ''[[Tolkien at Exeter College|Tolkien at Exeter College: How an Oxford undergraduate created Middle-earth]]'' by [[John Garth]] is published.
* '''[[30 September|30]]''' - [[Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor]] is released in North America.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 249]]'' is published.

==October==
* '''[[3 October|3]]''' - ''[[Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor]]'' is released in Europe.
* '''[[9 October|9]]''' - ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]'' pocket edition is published.
* '''[[13 October|13]]''' - ''[[Journal of Inklings Studies, vol.4 no.2]]'', including a translation of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Book of Jonah]]'', is published.
* '''[[21 October|21]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (extended edition)|The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug - Extended Edition]]'' is released for digital download.
* '''[[23 October|23]]''' - Writer and actor [[Bernard Mayes]] dies.
* '''[[30 October|30]]''' - [[The Hobbit and Tolkien's Mythology|The Hobbit ''and Tolkien's Mythology'']] is published.
* '''[[30 October|30]]''' - ''[[Arda Inhabited]]'' is published.

==November==
* '''[[3 November|3]]''' - [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (extended edition)|''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug'' Extended Edition]] is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the UK.
* '''[[4 November|4]]''' - [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (extended edition)|''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug'' Extended Edition]] is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the USA.
* '''[[11 November|11]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Activity Book]]'' is published.
* '''[[15 November|15]]''' - ''[[War of Words: Soldier-Poets of the Somme]]'' is aired.
* '''[[15 November|15]]''' - ''[[ArdaCraft]]'' begins building Middle-earth.
* '''[[20 November|20]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: The Movie Storybook]]'' is published.
* '''[[20 November|20]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Official Movie Guide]]'' is published.
* '''[[20 November|20]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Visual Companion]]'' is published.
* '''[[20 November|20]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit Trilogy Location Guide]]'' is published.
* '''[[30 November|30]]''' - ''[[Tolkien's Great War (documentary)]]'' by Zander and Elliot Weaver  is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 250]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Mallorn 55]]'' is published.

==December==
* '''[[1 December|1]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' premières in [[wikipedia:Leicester Square|Leicester Square]], London.
* '''[[4 December|4]]''' -  [[JRR Tolkien, le seigneur des écrivains]] (La Grande Librairie) is aired.
* '''[[5 December|5]]''' - ''[[Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor]]'' wins one Game Award, out of three nominations, at the [[wikipedia:The  Game Awards 2014|2014 The Game Awards]].
* '''[[8 December|8]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition]]'' is released.
* '''[[11 December|11]]''' - '''''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' is released in New Zealand.'''
* '''[[12 December|12]]''' - '''''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' is released  in the United Kingdom.'''
* '''[[17 December|17]]''' - '''''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' is released in the United States.'''
* '''[[17 December|17]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Chronicles: Art & Design]]'' is published.
